original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3516)@</color>匯聚周遭的雷霆之力到武器之中，然後對前方斬出三道雷電衝擊波，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3516)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3516)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>造成傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3516)@</color> gather the power of the surrounding thunder into the weapon, and then cut three thunder and lightning at the front Shockwave, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3516)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3516)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> causes damage.
